citations.narrative:
The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2024, which was due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st,
2024, was not submitted. In order to assure that professionally acceptable standards governing the care and use of
animals are followed, each reporting facility shall submit an annual report covering the use of live animals in the previous
federal fiscal year on or before December 1st of each calendar year.
The facility must ensure the annual report is submitted in a timely fashion, by December 01 of each year.
To be corrected by 18 Sept. 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2024, which was due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st, 
2024, was not submitted. In order to assure that professionally acceptable standards governing the care and use of 
animals are followed, each reporting facility shall submit an annual report covering the use of live animals in the previous 
federal fiscal year on or before December 1st of each calendar year. 
 
The facility must ensure the annual report is submitted in a timely fashion, by December 01 of each year. 
 
To be corrected by 18 Sept. 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
